title: Hemsworth and Ruffalo Shift from Superheroes to Thriller in Crime 101
summary: Chris Hemsworth and Mark Ruffalo, renowned for their roles as Thor and Hulk in Marvel films, have reunited for a new project titled Crime 101, a psychological thriller that diverges from their typical superhero genre. In this film, Hemsworth portrays an elusive jewel thief planning a final heist, while Ruffalo stars as a determined detective pursuing him. The actors discussed their collaboration at the premiere, highlighting how their long-standing friendship brought both energy and challenges to the production. Hemsworth noted that their dynamic often resembles "naughty school kids" needing focus, but Crime 101 required a shift into dramatic territory, causing initial discomfort as they adjusted from comedic chemistry. Ruffalo emphasized that this film allowed Hemsworth to showcase a transformative performance, different from his usual roles, and revealed that they had been planning to work together outside Marvel for years. The project materialized when Hemsworth approached Ruffalo with the script, which Ruffalo immediately accepted. This collaboration marks a significant career move for both actors, exploring darker themes and demonstrating their versatility beyond blockbuster franchises.
